iati-activity.title: Journalism Award  Corruption
iati-activity.description: The high value award recognises the important role which the media plays in ensuring that public officials are held to account for the use of public funds in promoting good governance by exposing uncomfortable truths, shining light on systemic corruption, and providing accountability in societies yearning for democracy and development.

Research on Mob Justice
iati-activity.description: he research will be guided by the need to respond to the following key issues: 1. Establishing the number of cases of mob justice registered 2. An analysis of the underlying causes of mob justice 3. Provind recommendations aimed at curtaliling the practice in Malawi.

iati-activity.title: City of Stars Malawi Arts Festival - Flight cost for George the Poet
iati-activity.description: A two day international arts festival and conference in Lilongwe, Malawi. Aimed to promote Malawian music, arts and culture and explore the potential of cultural tourism in Malawi.

iati-activity.title: Research on Mob Justice
iati-activity.description: The research will be guided by the need to respond to the following key issues: 1. Establishing the number of cases of mob justice registered 2. An analysis of the underlying causes of mob justice 3. Provide recommendations aimed at curtaliling the practice in Malawi.

iati-activity.title: Malawi Bail Project
iati-activity.description: This project will educate those going through the court process about court procedure and their basic legal rights, in particular the right to bail and consequently, increase the amount of bail applications made at the first court appearance prior to detentioN.
The project will train women in making charcoal briquettes and these will be used instead of using firewood as a domestic source of energy
iati-activity.title: Bolero Women's Charcoal Briquette Making Project

iati-activity.title: Advice to the Malawi Min Of Mines
iati-activity.description: A revision of Malawis draft legislation on extractives, policy improvements and a path for further support to Malawis sectoral development. Beneficial to British companies looking for a fair regulatory environment and certainty; to our development objectives; and in line with our G8 Presidency Transparency, Trade and Tax agenda.

iati-activity.description: Online, digital and media resources for learners to improve their English language skills.

iati-activity.title: Question Time Malawi
iati-activity.description: The programme will give an opportunity to the electorate to learn more about key political parties in Malawi hence allowing them to make an informed decision when voting in May2014.
